actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require food package labels to disclose, in addition to other information required under law, the packing date and last sale date of the food.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the labels on packages containing perishable or semiperishable food to disclose, in addition to other information required under law, the packing date and last sale date of the food.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require food package labels to disclose, in addition to other information required under law, the packing date and last sale date of the food.
